name: noodleseed-chatgpt-app
description: NoodleSeed ChatGPT App - Node.js/TypeScript MCP Server

scripts.build:widgets: npm run build:widget:platform && npm run build:widget:list && npm run build:widget:carousel
scripts.build:widget:platform: npx @fractal-mcp/cli bundle --entrypoint=./ui/NoodleSeedPlatform.tsx --out=./dist/noodleseed-platform-temp.html && cp dist/noodleseed-platform-temp.html/index.html dist/noodleseed-platform.html && rm -rf dist/noodleseed-platform-temp.html
scripts.build:widget:list: npx @fractal-mcp/cli bundle --entrypoint=./ui/NoodleSeedList.tsx --out=./dist/noodleseed-list-temp.html && cp dist/noodleseed-list-temp.html/index.html dist/noodleseed-list.html && rm -rf dist/noodleseed-list-temp.html
scripts.build:widget:carousel: npx @fractal-mcp/cli bundle --entrypoint=./ui/NoodleSeedCarousel.tsx --out=./dist/noodleseed-carousel-temp.html && cp dist/noodleseed-carousel-temp.html/index.html dist/noodleseed-carousel.html && rm -rf dist/noodleseed-carousel-temp.html
